column2: Version. Checked when parsing. Should be version 0 currently.
asset ID as specified in Slip 44 https://github.com/satoshilabs/slips/blob/master/slip-0044.md, 42 for decred
duration from creation that the refund path can be taken. i.e. 72h
number of signatures needed for the multisig path
xpubs separated by comma. Order cannot be changed once tx is created
address to amount in coins separated with commas one new line per
below this a new line and then a json containing a transaction will be filled in
after initial funds are sent and the spending transaction is created. Pass this
file around to receive signatures. The original creator can use this to refund
after the locktime has passed as well. The creator must not loose this file
before funds have moved from the multisig.
